alert.note: Alert for Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 06 at 5:45AM EDT until April 06 at 6:49PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...West Canada Creek At Kast Bridge. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...At 6.0 feet, Minor flood stage. The river begins to overflow into low lying RV parks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:15 AM EDT Thursday the stage was 6.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 5:15 AM EDT Thursday was 7.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this morning and continue falling to 4.1 feet early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 6.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && West Canada Creek Kast Bridge Flood Stage: 6.0 Observed Stage at Thu 5 am: 6.5 Forecast: Thu 8 am 6.3 Thu 2 pm 5.4 Thu 8 pm 5.0 Fri 2 am 4.7 Fri 8 am 4.5 Fri 2 pm 4.4 Fri 8 pm 4.3 Sat 2 am 4.2 Sat 8 am 4.2 Sat 2 pm 4.1 Sat 8 pm 4.1 Sun 2 am 4.1 &&
